DescriptionData.Title: Graftobian F/X Aire Airbrush Make-Up - Turquoise 2oz
DescriptionData.Description:
Graftobians F/X Aire HD Airbrush makeup is alcohol based, smooth and trouble free. Graftobian Airbrush makeup goes on quick and easy with excellent coverage that will last 12-14 hours. Because Graftobian uses much smaller particles, and a more durable alcohol soluble copolymer, than other brands you have no clogging with better adhesion to the skin, so your work will stay looking amazing for the whole day, even if they get wet or come in contact with sweat.
F/X Aire HD Airbrush makeup washes off easily with warm soap, water and a little scrubbing. F/X Aire does not need thinning with water or alcohol; it's already the perfect consistency for airbrushing. Note that thinning the makeup can cause clumping or clogging.
**Due to alcohol content remember to use care when spraying on faces. 2oz bottle/Turquoise.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: F/X Aire HD Airbrush makeup is alcohol based, smooth and trouble free
More durable, can get wet and still last the whole day but washes off easily with warm soap, water and a little scrubbing
Non-toxic, can be used on skin, fabric, wood, and plastic
Graftobian F/X Aire does not need thinning with water or alcohol
Available in 2oz bottles

DescriptionData.Title: Global Body Art Large Rainbow Split Cake - Positano (50 gm)
DescriptionData.Description: Global Body Art Split Cakes are multiple colors of highly pigmented face paints, arranged side by side in a single container. Multiple colors can be picked up simultaneously to create colorful designs quickly and easily.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Includes colors: Red, Neon Pink, Lilac, Baby Blue, Neon Green, Yellow
Heavily pigmented, water based face paints
Blends in smoothly to provide solid coverage
Easy to apply and remove
Each 50 gram Global Split Cake will give approximately 100-250 applications

DescriptionData.Title: Graftobian ProPaint - 12 Color Master Case, Empty
DescriptionData.Description: Graftobian ProPaint Box is a great way to keep your ProPaint colors organized.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Easy to carry snapcase box with 12 holes; each hole can hold a 1 oz/30 ml ProPaint color
Great way to organize your ProPaint colors
Highly portable and easy to clean
Wash paint off with just soap and water

DescriptionData.Title: Graftobian ProPaint - 12 Color Master Kit #2
DescriptionData.Description: Graftobian ProPaint is a highly pigmented, professional grade cake makeup that gives great coverage over large areas. Perfect for smear resistant finishes for long performances. Regular and Metallic colors are perfect for face and body art, where as the Neon colors work great for hair and nails.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Easy to carry snapcase box with 4 regular, 4 metallic and 4 neon colors

Includes colors: Gilded Gold, Silver Sterling, Clockwork Copper, Pearl Frost, Shocking Pink, Electric Yellow, Atomic Orange, Radioactive Green, MegaGenta, Eggplant, Second Skin, and Aztec Turquoise - 1 oz/30 ml each
ProPaint is a highly Pigmented Glycerin-based cake makeup that gives non-streaky, long-lasting finish.
Neon colors recommended for use on hair and nails only
Made in the USA, with FDA approved ingredients.

DescriptionData.Title: Graftobian ProPaint - 12 Color Master Kit #1
DescriptionData.Description: Graftobian ProPaint is a highly pigmented, professional grade cake makeup that gives great coverage over large areas. Perfect for smear resistant finishes for long performances.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Easy to carry snapcase box with 12 ProPaint colors

Includes colors: White Swan, Raven Black, Crimson Red, Catalina Blue, Buttercup Yellow, Mantis Green, Orange Sunset, Wild Violet, Tickled Pink, Tropic Teal, Fuzzy Bear Brown, and Graveyard Grey - 1 oz/30 ml each
ProPaint is a highly Pigmented Glycerin-based cake makeup that gives non-streaky, long-lasting finish
Color intensity can be controlled by adjusting the amount of water used
Made in the USA, with FDA approved ingredients

DescriptionData.Title: Wolfe E-Flow Alcohol Based Airbrush Makeup - Yellow Sun, 1oz
DescriptionData.Description: Wolfe E-FLOW Airbrush makeup is an alcohol based hybrid with vibrant colors that go on smoothly for great coverage that lasts for hours. E-FLOW airbrush makeup requires no mixing or diluting. E-FLOW can be used on skin as well as, fabrics, canvas, paper, wood, leather, and clay. Wolfe airbrush makeup is resistant to water, sweat and a small amount of rubbing. E-FLOW Airbrush makeup cleans off easily with soap, water and a wash cloth. Made in the USA. **Due to alcohol content remember to use care when spraying on faces. Available in 1oz bottles/Yellow Sun
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: E-FLOW can be used on skin as well as, fabrics, leather, canvas, paper, wood, and clay
Vibrant colors go on smoothly for great, long lasting and cleans up easily with soap, water
Ready to use, no mixing required
Made in the USA
Available in 1oz bottles

DescriptionData.Title: Graftobian F/X Aire Airbrush Make-Up - Neon Violet 2oz
DescriptionData.Description: Graftobian's F/X Aire black HD Airbrush makeup is alcohol based, smooth and trouble free. Graftobian Airbrush makeup goes on quick and easy with excellent coverage that will last 12-14 hours. Because Graftobian uses much smaller particles, and a more durable alcohol soluble copolymer, than other brands you have no clogging with better adhesion to the skin, so your work will stay looking amazing for the whole day! Your airbrush creations will look great for the whole day, even if they get wet or come in contact with sweat. F/X Aire HD Airbrush makeup washes off easily with warm soap, water and a little scrubbing. F/X Aire does not need thinning with water or alcohol; it's already the perfect consistency for airbrushing. Note that thinning the makeup can cause clumping or clogging.**Due to alcohol content remember to use care when spraying on faces.  2oz bottle/Neon Violet.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: F/X Aire HD Airbrush makeup is alcohol based, smooth and trouble free
More durable, can get wet and still last the whole day but washes off easily with warm soap, water and a little scrubbing
Non-toxic, can be used on skin, fabric, wood, and plastic
Graftobian F/X Aire does not need thinning with water or alcohol
Available in 2oz bottles

Graftobian F/X Aire does not need thinning with water or alcohol
Available in 2oz bottles

DescriptionData.Title: Graftobian F/X Aire Airbrush Make-Up - Opal 2oz
DescriptionData.Description:
Graftobians F/X Aire HD Airbrush makeup is alcohol based, smooth and trouble free. Graftobian Airbrush makeup goes on quick and easy with excellent coverage that will last 12-14 hours. Because Graftobian uses much smaller particles, and a more durable alcohol soluble copolymer, than other brands you have no clogging with better adhesion to the skin, so your work will stay looking amazing for the whole day, even if they get wet or come in contact with sweat.
F/X Aire HD Airbrush makeup washes off easily with warm soap, water and a little scrubbing. F/X Aire does not need thinning with water or alcohol; it's already the perfect consistency for airbrushing. Note that thinning the makeup can cause clumping or clogging.
**Due to alcohol content remember to use care when spraying on faces. 2oz bottle/Opal.

More durable, can get wet and still last the whole day but washes off easily with warm soap, water and a little scrubbing
Non-toxic, can be used on skin, fabric, wood, and plastic
Graftobian F/X Aire does not need thinning with water or alcohol
Available in 2oz bottles
